;

;Until October 25, 2023, Hong Huanhuan’s relatives and friends came to the community and held up placards asking the residents here to provide information about her life over the past year. , the details of the work, residents of Building 14 of Yintai Yuhuayuan in Wuhan, Hubei Province realized that an ambulance had pulled a female domestic worker away from the building in the morning three days ago.

;

;Since September 2022, Hong Huanhuan, as a live-in nanny, has been taking care of the children of her employer Xiong, a pair of twins who have just turned two years old. On the morning of October 22, 2023, the 38-year-old fell to the ground at Xiong’s home. A few hours later, relatives and friends rushed to the hospital after hearing the news and saw her body.

;

;"What impressed me most was my sister's eyes that she never closed until she died, and the tears in the corners of her eyes." On October 31, Hong Huanhuan's brother Hong Mingxuan told Southern Weekend reporter.

;

;The last time Hong Huanhuan saw her family was during the May Day holiday in 2023. She and her husband returned to their hometown in Hanchuan, Hubei Province to visit their children and the elderly at home. Over the next five months, whenever someone wanted to ask her out, she always said she was too busy at her employer's house. In early October, Xiong called the housekeeping company and told the housekeeping company that Dabao accidentally injured his leg when Hong Huanhuan took her child to play on the slide on October 2. The housekeeping company immediately offered to visit her, but Xiong refused.

;

;When we meet again, we will be separated forever. The family found a wound on her head and multiple bruises on her body and immediately called the police. The doctor told Hong Mingxuan that Hong Huanhuan had no heartbeat at Xiong's home.

;

;;
;

;

;Wuhan, Hubei, Yintai Yuhuayuan Community, the building where the employer Xiong lives Building. Photographed by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Xuqiulin

;

;First time moving into the home

;

;It has been nearly 10 years since Yintai Yuhuayuan was built. Lianjia APP shows that this community’s historical transaction volume and listing price of nearly 25,000 yuan per square meter are the highest in Wuhan’s Baibuting area.

;

;Several neighbors recalled that in 2020 or even earlier, Xiong bought the four-bedroom, two-bedroom apartment in Yintai Yuhuayuan from the previous resident. Wei's house has an area of ​​about 160 square meters. Wang Yifei, a neighbor across the door, told Southern Weekend reporters that he visited Xiong's house when it was being renovated. It was "Chinese style, all made of mahogany, very luxurious. It is said to have been left behind by the previous owner."

;

;Wang Yifei said that he likes to chat with people, but does not like to deal with Xiong, because the other party often talks about issues such as community hygiene, neighbor decoration, and exercise noise downstairs. In the building group, they criticized others and used fierce language. Sometimes when he meets Hong Huanhuan in the elevator, Wang Yifei will chat with her.

;

;On November 8, a Southern Weekend reporter called Xiong’s contact number and it showed that the machine was down. According to the content recorded on Xiong’s short video account, she is born in the 1970s. She previously worked in the female body care business in Zaozhuang, Shandong, Xuzhou, Jiangsu and other places. She returned to Hubei in 2020 and opened a shop on the second floor of Yintai Yuhuayuan in the second half of the year. opened a beauty salon. Currently, the beauty salon is closed.

;

;A merchant surnamed Yuan downstairs of the beauty salon recalled to Southern Weekend reporters that Xiong's hometown is in Huangpi, Wuhan, and he bought the second-floor store from himself in 2020. , the lease term was agreed to be three years. Less than a year later, due to pregnancy, he planned to sell the store, and there was "a little dispute" when he quit the lease.

;

;The husband did not appear in the short video taken by Xiong. After returning to Wuhan, most of the content she posted was related to emotions, and sometimes she revealed her depressed side. At the end of August 2021, the twins, a boy and a girl, were born. From the moment the baby could raise his head, to babbling, to taking the baby for a walk, she liked to share everything online. She said that she wanted to be a happy mother for the sake of her children, but she also said that whether her temper was good or not depended on "how you treat me."

;

;On October 6, after the child was injured while playing on the slide, Xiong asked among his neighbors if there were any hourly workers he knew well, and requested that he cook lunch once a day and clean the house. Home Hygiene. Many neighbors recalled that they had never met Xiong's husband. Before that, Xiong's father occasionally came over to help with the child, but he returned to his home two months before the incident.

;

;;

;

;On October 28, 2023, the door of Xiong’s house was closed, and no one answered the knock on the door. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Xuqiulin

;

;Hong Huanhuan was an employee of Wuhan Auntie Lai Housekeeping Service Co., Ltd. during his lifetime. Carrying twins for Xiong was Hong Huanhuan's first job since she was transferred to a new job as a nanny, with a monthly salary of 6,500 yuan. In the opinion of a colleague named Hu, the salary of this job is not high. According to the market price in Wuhan, it costs 6,000-8,000 yuan for a nanny to take care of a child who is not in kindergarten. "Generally, two aunts take care of twins."

;

;Before the job transfer, Hong Huanhuan's position was as a domestic agent. Former colleague Gao Xuemei explained to a reporter from Southern Weekend that in a housekeeping company, an agent's income mainly depends on personal performance. "The more orders you sign, the more you get." In the past few years due to the epidemic, some domestic workers have had a heavy financial burden and have chosen to change careers. The wages of domestic agents have also dropped from seven to eight thousand yuan per month to at most four to five thousand yuan.

;

;Hong Huanhuan’s husband Wu Qiang works on the assembly line of an electronics factory in Wuhan, and his father-in-law has a pension. My father-in-law passed away due to illness in 2021. My 70-year-old mother-in-law has underlying diseases and has to take care of their two children who are in school in their hometown in Hanchuan.

;

;"I didn't make much money in the past few years, so my sister said I needed a stable job." Hong Mingxuan explained the reason why Hong Huanhuan became a childcare nanny. His wife is the general manager of Wuhan Auntie Housekeeping Company.

;

;Hong Mingxuan and Hong Huanhuan grew up together. He recalled that after graduating from junior high school, his sister first went to work in Guangdong and then went to Zhangjiakou to set up a stall. In 2018, she returned to Wuhan to work as a housekeeper to be closer to the children and to take care of the elderly. During this period, she took the nanny qualification certificate.

;

;Gao Xuemei recalled that the two met in October 2022 after Hong Huanhuan moved into the household. Hong Huanhuan said that she and Xiong took care of the baby together. She took the baby to bed at night, and the child's grandfather was responsible for doing housework. Hong Huanhuan mentioned that her clients love to keep their homes clean. Although she does not need to do most of the hygiene, she will help with cleaning and washing baby clothes as long as she has time.

;

;Hong Huanhuan told Gao Xuemei at that time, "Bao's mother (Xiong) may not be in a good mood sometimes, and sometimes she will curse" and sometimes lose her temper at her , and when he is good to her, he is very nice.

;

;“I broke my client’s child’s bone after falling”

;

;After the child’s accident on the slide, Xiong’s short video account had more than a dozen There has been no update for days. On October 16, she sang in a new video, "The happiness I envy is always not available, and the people I love who love me are not taken care of."

;

;The above-mentioned merchant recalled that previously, Xiong and Hong Huanhuan often took their two children for walks in and around the community garden. One day in early October, she once saw Xiong with a red face, as if he had drunk alcohol. As he walked, he scolded Hong Huanhuan behind him for being "too cruel." In the next few days, Hong Huanhuan came to her store to pick up the express delivery, and she found that he "was not looking very well."

;

;According to rumors, Xiong asked Hong Huanhuan to compensate Hong Huanhuan 100,000 yuan after his child was injured while playing on the slide. Hong Mingxuan confirmed this amount to Southern Weekend reporters. The second sisters of Hong Mingxuan, Gao Xuemei and Wu Qiang said that after the incident, Hong Huanhuan borrowed money from them or people around her on WeChat.

;

;In October, the winter jujubes in Gao Xuemei's hometown were ripe. She sent Hong Huanhuan a WeChat message: "Huanhuan, give me your home address and send the jujubes to you." At around 11 o'clock in the evening on October 12, Hong Huanhuan replied: "Don't send it, I'm not in the mood to eat it. I broke the customer's child's leg." Gao Xuemei asked, but Hong Huanhuan did not reply.

;

;On October 20, Gao Xuemei received a text message from Hong Huanhuan: "Dear, do you have any money? Can you lend me 10,000 yuan?" She replied: "Huanhuan, I'm sorry, my mother was diagnosed with cancer two months ago. She is undergoing radiotherapy and chemotherapy this month, and may need an operation. I really don't have much money to give you." Hong Huanhuan told her: "It's okay, it's okay. I've pretty much taken care of it here. I caused you trouble." This was their last contact.

;

;Wu Qiang’s second sister said that a few days before the incident, Hong Huanhuan also borrowed money from Wu Qiang’s eldest sister. The eldest sister handed over the money without saying anything. Afterwards, the eldest sister talked to her about the hurried video call and recalled that Hong Huanhuan wore a mask the whole time at Xiong's house.

;

;Wu Qiang’s second sister later calculated that since October, Wu Qiang and his relatives and friends had given Hong Huanhuan a total of 61,000 yuan.

;

;Hong Mingxuan also lent money to his sister. He said he didn't ask much at the time. After all, the child was injured and it was understandable that his sister needed to compensate.

;

;Hong Mingxuan said that before joining the household in 2022, Hong Huanhuan was diagnosed with gallstones and other indicators were normal, but he did not provide the corresponding physical examination report.

;

;They don’t know why Hong Huanhuan died suddenly. Many neighbors interviewed said that they did not pay attention to the family's movements. Only the camera installed by Wang Yifei in the corridor recorded some of the family's comings and goings on October 21 and 22.

;

;At 8:35, 10:26 and 17:32 on the 21st, Xiong, Hong Huanhuan and a middle-aged woman with short hair took two The children came in and out of the house three times. Among them, the short-haired woman was always carrying a girl, Xiong was pushing a car with a boy in it, and Hong Huanhuan was wearing gray short-sleeves and gray trousers. Hong Huanhuan wore a mask when she went out twice. When she appeared in front of the camera, she did not take her children with her. She always carried handbags, vegetables or garbage.

;

;;

;

;In the surveillance video, on October 21, 2023, Xiong (left) and Hong Huanhuan (right) walked out of the elevator mouth. Video screenshot

;

;The camera did not record when the five of them returned home on the evening of the 21st. Until 9:02 a.m. on the 22nd, surveillance video showed that four first responders knocked on Xiong's door with medical oxygen bags, first aid kits, stretchers and other equipment.

;

;9 minutes later, emergency personnel carried Hong Huanhuan out of Xiong's home. At this time, Xiong went out with the stretcher, then stood outside the door and looked into the house. There was also a man standing in the house. This man had not appeared in the video before, and neighbors and Hong Huanhuan's relatives said they did not recognize the man.

;

;The surveillance video 10 seconds later showed that the door of Xiong’s home was closed and all the emergency personnel were standing in the elevator. Xiong had an extra green coat on his left hand, and holding three plastic bags in his right hand, he also squeezed into the elevator from the corridor. A male voice asked: "She was a little confused before?" The female voice replied: "Yes, yes, yes."

;

;According to Hong Mingxuan, after being sent to the hospital on the 22nd , the housekeeping company received a call from Xiong, saying that Hong Huanhuan "fainted" at home. The housekeeping company immediately notified Hong Huanhuan's family and sent people to the hospital. Hong Mingxuan said that he was relatively close to the hospital at the time and was the first to arrive. The housekeeping company, Hong Huanhuan's parents, husband and other relatives and friends arrived one after another. "It turned out that my sister was no longer here."

;

;It was close to noon when Hong Mingxuan arrived. Hong Huanhuan had already received rescue measures in the hospital for about an hour and a half. "The employer insisted on sending her to the hospital for rescue." He did not provide Hong Huanhuan's death certificate to Southern Weekend reporters, which usually indicates the time of death. He explained that since the police have opened a case for investigation, the hospital has not issued a death certificate to the family members.

;

;Surveillance video shows that Xiong returned home at 10:58 and 13:30 on the day Hong Huanhuan was sent to the hospital. At 15:21 that day, several police officers came to Xiong’s home.

;

;Sister Wu Qiang rushed to the police station on the afternoon of the 22nd. She recalled that she saw Xiong at the police station, and the two of them pushed and pushed because of their excitement. In the end, she was pulled away by the police; there was a man next to her, "I heard that he was her (Xiong's) husband."

;

;Later, Hong Mingxuan learned from the housekeeping company that Xiong’s husband usually did business in Guangdong and returned to Wuhan the day before the incident; Xiong did not have a formal job in Wuhan , taking care of the baby at home every day. Hong Mingxuan said that except for the meeting with Xiong at the police station on the 22nd, he had never seen him again. "There was no explanation of the situation and no apology."

;

;On October 25, staff from the Houhu Police Station of the Jiangan District Branch of the Wuhan Municipal Public Security Bureau told the media that the police had filed a case and the suspect had been controlled. The details of the case The whole story is still under investigation. On November 7, staff from Houhu Police Station told Southern Weekend reporters that they would not comment on the case for the time being.

;

;I haven’t seen my family for five months

;

;Hong Huanhuan’s colleague Zhang Lijia said that the housekeeping company bought insurance for every aunt who came to the household. If an aunt encounters an accident when she comes to work, such as being injured or damaging the employer's property, she should inform the housekeeper and the insurance company within 24 hours, and the claim settlement process can be started. "Every aunt will undergo training in this area."

;

;Hong Huanhuan has been working as a housekeeping agent since 2018, and is familiar with how to deal with accidents when domestic workers come to the household. "I can't figure out why it was only a few days later that Bao's mother notified the company that something happened to her child," Zhang Lijia said.

;

;When they were agents, Hong Huanhuan and Zhang Lijia lived together in the attic of the office for more than a year. They often cook and sing together. In the summer after get off work, they would set up a table in front of the store to drink and have late-night snacks together. But after Hong Huanhuan moved into the household, the two of them had fewer opportunities to meet.

;

;On September 24, Zhang Lijia sent Hong Huanhuan a WeChat message and asked her what she was doing, but Hong Huanhuan did not reply. Zhang Lijia thought she was just busy. "When the crayfish came out (in summer), I asked her if she wanted to go out to eat together. She said that she probably didn't have time recently. Let's eat together when the hairy crabs come out (in autumn and winter)." When Zhang Lijia contacted Hong Huanhuan in the summer of 2023, the other party said this She agreed.

;

;Hong Huanhuan likes to shoot short videos, recording her daily life with family gatherings, going to the beach with colleagues, and taking her children out to play. These contents are updated frequently, and there are always several items a month. After transferring to a household, although the frequency has decreased, she still posted photos, recording some moments when she was infected with the new crown, New Year gatherings, and going for walks.

;

;On April 30, she and her daughter co-produced a short video of singing together, with the text: "The newly bought parent-child pajamas, this baby has to take a photo Video." Since then, this account has not posted any new content.

;

;That time coincided with Hong Huanhuan and Wu Qiang returning to Hanchuan. Their hometowns are both in the same town, about two kilometers apart. This was also the time when many relatives recalled the last time they saw Hong Huanhuan.

;

;Relatives in my hometown said that Hong Huanhuan looked fine on May Day. Wu Qiang's mother recalled that in the 15 years since their marriage, she had never seen her son and daughter-in-law have a word with each other. Even though she was sometimes short-tempered, Hong Huanhuan never had a dispute with her.

;

;;

;

;The entrance to Hong Huanhuan’s hometown village in Hanchuan, Hubei. Photo by Southern Weekend reporter Wang Xuqiulin

;

;Hong Huanhuan's colleague said that nanny's have four days of leave every month, and they can ask for leave from clients if they have something to do. Wu Qiang previously rented a room near his workplace in Wuhan, which was not close to Yintai Yuhuayuan, but Hong Huanhuan would go there every time he was on vacation. If they were free, the two would go back to their hometown to look after their children. Before every vacation to see Wu Qiang, Hong Huanhuan would go to Hong Mingxuan's house to see her parents.

;

;But after the May Day holiday in 2023, Hong Huanhuan did not take any vacation. When Hong Mingxuan saw that his sister had not been here for several months, he asked his mother about her current situation, "I always ask my mother to persuade my sister that there is endless money to be made, but every time we let her take a vacation, she always said that Bao's mother's children can't live without her. she".

;

;Hong Mingxuan did not return to Hanchuan on May Day and missed the opportunity to finally reunite with his sister. Looking back now, he regrets it.

;

;Hong Huanhuan has two mobile phones. When she was a housekeeping agent, she was basically online 24 hours a day. However, after becoming a housekeeping aunt, she often did not reply to messages in time. Gao Xuemei explained that it is considered a professional ethics for housekeeping aunts not to look at their mobile phones when taking care of the baby. Unless they check the time or encounter an emergency, they have to wait until the baby goes to bed at night before contacting the family.

;

;Hong Mingxuan said that after taking care of her two children, her family knew that Hong Huanhuan was busy with work and would not call on her if there was no urgent matter. My mother usually had a lot of contact with Hong Huanhuan, and she "would never go without replying to messages for a long time." However, after May Day, Hong Huanhuan rarely spoke in the family group, and sometimes it took several days to reply to messages. During one of these times, her mother had a I haven't contacted my daughter for many weeks and I am very anxious. They found Xiong through the housekeeping company and talked to Hong Huanhuan on the phone. They were told that "her mobile phone was broken."

;

;Hong Mingxuan said that he later learned from his sister’s friends that “the employer had confiscated her mobile phone.”

;

;Many relatives and friends said that Hong Huanhuan once said privately that he found this job "very tiring" and did not want to renew the contract. He would wait until Xiong found a suitable childcare nanny. household. But in September 2023, after one year, she signed a new contract with the other party. Gao Xuemei asked Hong Huanhuan why she renewed her contract, and Hong Huanhuan told her, "It's better to be experienced than to do it for a living. Once you are familiar with the customers and the baby, then just keep doing it."

;

;At this time, Hong Huanhuan and her children had not seen each other for nearly 5 months. After learning that Hong Huanhuan could not go home during the National Day holiday, her family made an appointment with her to meet her children downstairs in the community where she worked. But on October 1, Wu Qiang drove his two children from Hanchuan to Wuhan. When they were waiting for Hong Huanhuan to come out at the gate of Yintai Yuhuayuan, her mobile phone could not be contacted again.

;

;“No work at home”

;

;Gao Xuemei remembered that Hong Huanhuan said when they met a year ago: "Bao's mother (Xiong) is not easy. , she has to take care of her children and do things with me. She has also taught me a lot, and she is not willing to cause trouble to the agent. I will try my best to complete this list and complete this contract (period). ."

;

;The first time she went to the household, Hong Huanhuan’s usual requests for help were always related to Xiong’s children. In June and July 2023, she asked Gao Xuemei on WeChat: "Why is the baby's butt always red? Why does the baby always leak when wearing diapers?"

;

;Zhang Lijia said that she was not Hong Huanhuan's agent and could not comment on Hong Huanhuan's professional ability as a housekeeping aunt, but she believed that "aunties always have shortcomings" and "give her some patience and tolerance." , talents will grow slowly."

;

;In Gao Xuemei’s eyes, domestic work deals with people, and it is impossible not to be emotionally involved, “especially for children, if you don’t have love and patience, Can't do this."

;

;Zhang Lijia has always wanted to make the job of "domestic worker" more professional. She deliberately maintains some habits, such as showing her business card before communicating with clients, displaying posters showing herself in professional attire, and putting on makeup before going to work. There are also more than a dozen skills that housekeeping aunts can master after receiving training in the company. "Customers contribute to society outside the family, and we also provide customers with no worries at home."

;

;But she also admitted that the group of housekeeping aunts has average academic qualifications. It is not high and the economy is not well-off. Faced with the requirements of different customers, anxiety is normal.

;

;Before becoming a domestic agent, Zhang Lijia also worked as a live-in nanny. "Living at home is like a 24-hour service, without getting off work."

;

;After becoming an agent, Zhang Lijia needs to appease the housekeeping aunt when she comes to the house and needs help, such as Some aunts will report to her that they are accused by their employers of eating too much and cooking poorly... "Many times they cannot tell their family members about their grievances."

;

; "It's too late to regret it." Another colleague who has a good relationship with Hong Huanhuan said that the housekeeping aunt is at the door 24 hours a day. She is worried that chatting with Hong Huanhuan will affect her work and rest, so she has not had any voice or video chat with Hong Huanhuan. "I didn't find any abnormalities earlier."

;

;Hong Huanhuan’s former office was hidden in a first-floor shop in a high-end community in Wuhan. This office of about 60 square meters has a kitchen, bathroom and dormitory. Zhang Lijia said that sometimes some aunts would come here to stay for two days when they were on vacation and could not go home far away.

;

;There are still shelves, small blackboards, green plants, medicines, and hooks purchased by Hong Huanhuan during his lifetime. After Hong Huanhuan came to the house, Zhang Lijia sat at her former workstation. "There are traces of Huanhuan everywhere."

;

;When dealing with Hong Huanhuan’s old things left in the store, Zhang Lijia left behind the microphone they used to sing together. She said that when they lived in the attic, one slept under a red mosquito net and the other slept under a white mosquito net. They called themselves the "Red Lotus Leader" and the "White Lotus Leader." "She is like my sister, who once brought so much joy to our lives."

;

;After Hong Huanhuan passed away, many housekeeping aunts expressed their concern on her social media Express your condolences under the account. Some aunts also sent messages to Zhang Lijia expressing concern. "Everyone misses her, and part of them thinks of themselves."

;

; (Hong Mingxuan, Wang Yifei, Gao Xuemei, Wu Qiang, and Zhang Lijia are pseudonyms in the article. Yao Zhili and Southern Weekend intern Du Feng also contributed to this article)

;After many years of preparation, the Financial Stability Law is expected to complete the legislative process during the term of the 14th National People’s Congress.

;

;On October 21, 2023, entrusted by the State Council, Pan Gongsheng, Governor of the People's Bank of China, made a report on the financial work of the State Council at the sixth meeting of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress. , Accelerate the legislative work of financial stability law. Previously, on September 7, the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress issued a legislative plan, and the Financial Stability Law was listed as a first-category item, that is, "draft laws with relatively mature conditions and to be submitted for review during the term of office." ;

;

;How does the Financial Stability Law (Draft) (hereinafter referred to as the "Draft") absorb and learn from the experience and lessons learned from the handling of past domestic financial risk cases? How do different regulatory agencies collaborate? How to prevent local government from interfering but not lying down? How to solve the source of financial stability guarantee fund? How is it related to the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund, Deposit Insurance Fund, and Industry Guarantee Fund? What are the substantive differences between the People's Bank of China version and the National People's Congress version of the draft that are open for public comment? How does it draw on relevant international legal provisions and common international practices?

;

;Researchers from the Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center compared and studied the differences between the two versions on the above issues, conducted horizontal studies on the operation paths of multinational financial stability funds, and even discussed and exchanged ideas with industry experts. The core outline of the draft aims to make overall arrangements for the financial stability system from a cross-industry and cross-department perspective, focusing on responding to major financial risks; in terms of legislative key points, the draft clarifies financial risks in three stages: pre-prevention, mid-event resolution and post-event disposal. Key points, while defining the responsibilities of relevant entities such as financial institutions, local governments and regulatory authorities.

;

;Researchers from Southern Weekend’s New Financial Research Center believe that the Financial Stability Law is not only based on preventing financial risks, that is, “treating the disease before it occurs,” but also focuses on effectively handling financial risks, that is, “treating the disease before it occurs.”

;

;;The frequency of global financial risks is increasing;

;

;Throughout the history of world finance, from Amsterdam in the 18th century to New York in 2008, systemic financial crises have always been accompanied by financial crises. The ebb and flow of business.

;

;Ironically, on the eve of the 2008 financial crisis, Citigroup CEO Chuck Prince's words in 2007 became famous: "When the music called 'liquidity' stops abruptly (financial crisis (arrive), things will get tricky.”

;

;As the legislation of financial stability laws accelerates, the frequency of local financial risks around the world increases.

;

;In 2023, local financial risks will occur from time to time around the world. The collapse of Signature Bank follows a U.S. bank run in early March and the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank (SVB). Market panic quickly spread to Europe, and global systemically important bank Credit Suisse collapsed. Suddenly, Switzerland almost faced a full-scale bank run. Euro zone banks were under widespread pressure, with Deutsche Bank under pressure as investors sold shares en masse.

;

;To this end, the European Central Bank launched an industry-wide investigation into the exposure of euro area banks to rapidly rising interest rates, trying to understand how risks may spread to other industries and conduct stress tests. The International Monetary Fund came out in 2023 to warn of a possible global financial crisis in the world's rapidly expanding non-bank financial institutions. These institutions include insurance companies, pension funds, mutual funds and high-risk hedge funds. Shadow banking and complex financial instruments allow risk to breed and spread through interconnected financial institutions.

;

;To prepare for a rainy day, how to effectively combine "preventive treatment" and "treating existing diseases" has become a top priority for all countries. The Financial Stability Law can better combine "treating the disease" with "treating the disease before it occurs", and establish and improve the financial risk prevention, early warning, disposal and accountability system.

;

;;Emphasize;;the self-rescue responsibility of the disposed institution;

;

;Why is the Financial Stability Law listed as a Category I project?

;

;Researchers from the Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center found that in recent years, my country's financial legislation has been steadily advancing, and has been guided by basic financial laws such as the People's Bank of China Law, the Commercial Bank Law, the Securities Law and the Insurance Law. It is a multi-layered financial legal system in which financial administrative regulations, departmental rules and normative documents are important contents, and local regulations are supplementary.  

;

;However, the legal system involving financial stability lacks overall design and cross-industry and cross-department overall arrangements. Relevant provisions are scattered and overly principled, and some important issues lack institutional norms.

;

;Therefore, as an important legal cornerstone of China's financial regulatory system, the Financial Stability Law aims to ensure the stability of the financial system and improve the adaptability and risk response capabilities of financial institutions.

;

;Researchers at the Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center believe that this law has two major significances for financial stability.

;

;First, it clearly stipulates the establishment of a national financial stability and development overall coordination mechanism and member composition, and proposes a macro-prudential policy framework, governance mechanism and basic system, covering major financial institutions, financial markets, financial infrastructure and financial activities. The draft not only clarifies the responsibilities of governments at all levels, financial management departments, financial institutions and industry security funds, but also emphasizes cooperation and information sharing among various departments, especially when dealing with financial risks, it is necessary to strengthen anti-corruption and coordinate supervision, auditing and judicial . In addition, the draft also proposes the establishment of a financial stability guarantee fund. This creates strong institutional support for financial stability.

;

;The second is to emphasize the main responsibility of financial institutions, especially the responsibility of shareholders. Article 11 of the draft adds "Financial institutions should strictly abide by systems such as capital and risk management, corporate governance, related transactions, and customer rights protection, and effectively monitor, identify and prevent financial risks. Financial institutions should establish a system with clear rights and responsibilities and effective checks and balances." Corporate governance structure and internal control mechanism to prevent major shareholders, actual controllers, directors, supervisors, senior managers and other relevant personnel from violating regulations and intervening in the control of financial institutions," which further refines the requirements for subject responsibilities.

;

;The draft also clarifies the responsibilities, disposal measures and procedures of various departments when dealing with major financial risks, especially emphasizing the self-rescue responsibilities of the financial institutions being disposed of and the principle of adopting market-oriented disposal methods.

;

;;Stabilization Fund;;is;;Risk Disposal Reserve Fund;

;

;Compared with the central bank’s version of the consultation draft , what are the similarities and differences between the National People's Congress version of the draft?

;

;Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center compared the two versions and found that the People's Bank of China version has 8147 words and 48 items, and the National People's Congress version has 8433 words and 49 items; although the number of words and items has not changed much It's big, but actually a lot of content has been deleted.

;

;The first is to further improve the coordination mechanism among member units such as financial management departments, development and reform departments, and finance departments, clarify the nature and functions of the national financial stability and development coordination mechanism, and prevent work conflicts.

;

;The second is to clarify the positioning of the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund as a reserve fund for the country's major financial risk disposal. The draft specifically explains the purpose, sources of funds and repayment measures of the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund. Among them, the financial stability guarantee fund consists of funds raised from financial institutions, financial infrastructure operating institutions and other entities, as well as other funds specified by the State Council.

;

;The third is to strengthen the risk prevention functions and risk resolution rights of deposit insurance funds, clarify the scope of industry protection funds, and clarify the division of labor between supervision and protection funds. ;;

;

;Fourth, it is proposed for the first time that financial management departments and local people's governments should disclose relevant information on financial risk prevention, resolution and disposal in accordance with the law. And promptly clarify false or misleading information.

;

;Fifth, the provisions on the source of funds for disposal have been deleted from the People's Bank of China version, and the responsibility of local governments for the disposal of financial risks caused by non-financial enterprises has also been deleted. A researcher at the Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center believes that this should consider the resources and tools that local governments can mobilize when dealing with financial risks, while preventing excessive delegation of responsibilities and ensuring overall coordination of financial stability and development.

;

;Sixth, the relevant information of the national financial basic database must be provided to the people's governments of provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government, deposit insurance fund management agencies, and industry security fund management agencies. The financial management department of the State Council and provinces and autonomous regions , The people's governments of municipalities directly under the Central Government should promptly notify each other of discovered financial risks and hidden dangers, and strengthen information sharing in the coordination mechanism. ;;

;

;;Before, during and after the event;;,;;Parties Responsibilities are clear;

;

;The draft also clarifies a series of pre-, in- and post-prevention and handling measures for financial risks: pre-prevention emphasizes prudent access conditions, standardizing the company’s internal control mechanism, clarifying Prohibiting sexual behavior and other means to effectively control the source of financial risks. Regulatory authorities, governments, insurance protection fund management agencies and other departments should form a joint regulatory force and share data and information to identify and prevent potential risks in advance.

;

;In terms of resolving issues, the draft emphasizes actively responding to and resolving financial risks in their early stages. Regulatory authorities should assume the responsibility for regulatory correction, paying particular attention to the role of early corrective measures. At the same time, financial institutions should assume the responsibility of risk resolution as the main body, and adopt various methods according to the actual situation to reduce the scale of assets and liabilities, suspend related businesses, liquidate existing assets and other measures. Local governments should provide support and assistance within the scope of their responsibilities, and crack down on violations of laws and disciplines in accordance with the law to ensure that risks can be resolved as soon as possible.

;

;In terms of post-event disposal, the draft requires that the division of labor in financial risk disposal correspond to the responsibilities of each entity. In addition to the main responsibilities of the disposed financial institution and its major shareholders and actual controllers, corresponding support is also required from the deposit insurance fund, industry security funds, provincial governments, central banks, and financial departments to ensure that risks can be effectively resolved.

;

;Researchers from the Southern Weekend New Finance Research Center believe that the draft clarifies the division of responsibilities among various entities. This will prevent, resolve and deal with financial risks more effectively.

;

;;How do the Financial Stability Fund;; and the;;Deposit Insurance Fund;; collaborate;;? ;

;

;The financial stability guarantee fund in the draft has attracted much attention. How does it interact and complement the currently operating deposit insurance fund and industry protection fund?

;

;In May 2022, the former China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission published "Perseverance in Preventing and Resolving Major Financial Risks" in "Qiushi" magazine, which pointed out that the basic framework of the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund has been initially established, and the first batch of 64.6 billion yuan of funds has been Once the funds are raised in place, the deposit insurance system will be strengthened, and the management regulations for insurance protection funds and trust industry protection funds will be further revised and improved.

;

;The draft establishes a collaborative system for the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund. It has formed a cooperation model with a clear division of labor with the deposit insurance fund and industry guarantee fund. This collaborative system aims to maintain the stability of the financial system and provide multi-level protection against financial risks. The central bank's "Monetary Policy Implementation Report for the Fourth Quarter of 2022" mentioned that the basic framework of the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund has been initially established, a certain amount of funds have been accumulated, and it has been actually used in two risk disposal cases.

;

;The deposit insurance fund plays a key role in this collaborative system. On May 1, 2015, the "Deposit Insurance Regulations" came into effect, and my country's deposit insurance system was officially established. It sets differential rates based on the risk levels of financial institutions and promptly identifies and reports risks to promote early resolution of risks. The People's Bank of China disclosed that as of the end of 2022, 3,998 deposit-taking banking financial institutions across the country had gone through insurance procedures in accordance with regulations. In 2022, a total of 48.727 billion yuan in premiums had been collected, and fund interest income of 988 million yuan had been realized. Fund support was transferred back upon maturity. 276 million yuan, and the deposit insurance fund balance reached 54.94 billion yuan.

;

;The scale of insurance protection funds has also continued to expand, and the system has continued to be optimized. The insurance security fund is an industry risk relief fund formed by contributions in accordance with the provisions of the Insurance Law and the "Insurance Security Fund Management Measures" and is used to rescue policy holders, policy transferee companies or deal with insurance industry risks. In September 2008, China Insurance Security Fund Co., Ltd. was established to be responsible for the raising, management and use of security funds in accordance with the law.

;

;The trust industry protection fund/liquidity mutual aid fund has also been established, with funds paid by trust companies to deal with systemic risks of trust companies, large spillover risks and other major risks identified by regulatory authorities.

;

;The draft emphasizes the principle of caution in the use of the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund: it can only be used when it may cause systemic risks. The International Monetary Fund (IMF), the Bank for International Settlements (BIS) and the Financial Stability Board (FSB) define systemic financial risks as: large-scale disruptions in financial services caused by the destruction of all or part of the functions of the financial system, and This has had a serious negative impact on the real economy.

;

;This helps ensure the effective use of the Financial Stability Guarantee Fund, while promoting healthy competition and survival of the fittest in the financial market.

;

;;Overseas;;Financial Stability Fund;;: ;;Self-rescue first;;,;; strong>;;Post-external bailout;

;

;What experience do Europe and the United States have in preventing and resolving financial crises?

;

;The "Core Principles for an Effective Deposit Insurance System" jointly issued by the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS) and the International Association of Deposit Insurance (IADI) pointed out that the deposit insurance system is consistent with the central bank's lender of last resort function and prudential supervision. constitute the three pillars of the financial safety net. The deposit insurance system has been established in at least 146 countries and regions and is a basic institutional arrangement that is universally implemented internationally. For example, the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) of the United States.

;

;But it is not enough to have a safety net of bank savings. The eye of the financial crisis in 2008 was American International Group (AIG), the largest insurance company in the United States. If AIG went bankrupt at that time, in addition to the risk spreading to banks and non-bank financial institutions, the aircraft and cars it insured would not be able to be transported. This will bring huge chaos to society beyond economic activities. Therefore, there is a need for a protective mechanism specifically targeting systemic financial risks.

;

;The United States' Orderly Liquidation Fund (hereinafter referred to as "OLF") and Europe's Financial Stability Facility (EFSF) and European Stability Mechanism (ESM) are important safeguards established to address systemic financial risks and crises. Sexual security agency. Their establishment and operation are both unique and common.

;

;OLF was built to address the bankruptcy and liquidation issues of complex large financial institutions. The background to its establishment was the 2008 financial crisis. At that time, the government recognized that the bankruptcy of large financial institutions could trigger systemic risks. Subsequently, in 2010, the United States introduced the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act, which proposed the establishment of an orderly liquidation system and the establishment of an OLF to provide liquidity support for this purpose.

;

;OLF's funding sources are mainly the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) and creditors who receive compensation in the orderly liquidation process. After liquidating a problem institution, the FDIC can first borrow money from the Treasury Department. However, if the liquidation costs are not covered by the asset liquidation, fees will be charged to other financial institutions to replenish funds. This mechanism reduces the systemic risk of dealing with the bankruptcy of large financial institutions.

;

;Europe also has the Financial Stability Facility (EFSF) and the European Stability Mechanism (ESM). The EFSF was originally intended to provide temporary loans to maintain the stability of euro area member states. The main source of funding for the EFSF comes from loan guarantees provided by Eurozone member states, and it also issues bonds in international capital markets. The European Stability Mechanism (ESM) is the successor to the EFSF and has stronger rescue capabilities.

;

;Europe has also established a Single Resolution Mechanism (SRM) and a Single Resolution Fund (SRF). These mechanisms are used to deal with major financial risks and crises, especially those of multinational financial institutions. These mechanisms have played an important role in responding to the sovereign debt crisis, maintaining the stability of the euro, and promoting the European integration process.

;

;The above-mentioned basic protection funds are designed to maintain the stability of the financial system and respond to systemic risks, and emphasize the principle that the financial industry assumes the main responsibility and the national finance serves as backup support. They all adhere to the core principle of "self-rescue first, external assistance second", encouraging financial institutions to prioritize self-rescue in crises and reduce the involvement of external funds. These mechanisms provide experience and reference for the construction of my country's financial stability system.

;

;;The central-local coordination mechanism;;needs urgent improvement;

;

;Financial supervision involves the relationship between the central government and local governments. From the perspective of the financial powers of the central and local governments, there is a certain conflict between the central vertical supervision model and the local territorial supervision model. The central government usually pays more attention to national risk prevention and the stability of the financial system, while local governments may pay more attention to the development of local economies and the prosperity of local financial markets. In order to obtain financial support from institutions or more credit input, local financial regulatory authorities often choose to put benefits first. This different focus may lead to regulatory coordination problems, and the central and local coordination mechanisms urgently need to be further improved.

;

;In terms of risk management, local governments may use deposit insurance and other systems to shirk their responsibilities, and the public may misunderstand the deposit insurance system, resulting in the transfer of financial risks to other regulatory authorities.

;

;In order to better coordinate financial supervision between the central and local governments, a more complete central-local coordination mechanism should be established to ensure consistent policy objectives in risk prevention and financial supervision. As the draft emphasizes information sharing between.

;

;The National People's Congress version of the "Draft" deleted Article 38 of the People's Bank of China version regarding the order of use of disposal funds, or taking into account the possible conflict of powers between local governments and financial regulatory authorities. Objectively speaking, local governments are burdened with multiple tasks, and their ability to control systemic financial risks may exceed their current capabilities and human and financial resources. There may still be a situation where the central government still needs to handle risks, so there needs to be room for flexible operation on a case-by-case basis.

;

;In terms of financial stability, local financial regulatory authorities, based on the overall goal of full coverage of financial risks, are committed to specifying local financial risk prevention and control responsibilities, achieving necessary complements to central financial supervision, and avoiding local financial activities There is a regulatory vacuum.

;

;Taken together, strengthening financial regulatory coordination between the central and local governments is the key to ensuring the stability of the financial system and sustainable economic development. This requires prudent policy design, clear legal systems and effective implementation to ensure consensus and coordination among governments at all levels to jointly maintain the health and stability of the financial market.

;

;;The Financial Stability Law;;will have far-reaching impact;

;

;If the Financial Stability Law is formally implemented, its impact will be far-reaching.

;

;Researchers at the Southern Weekend New Financial Research Center believe that the bill will have far-reaching impacts in five aspects.

;

;First, we will strengthen the supervision of financial institutions and pay more attention to risk prevention, thereby reducing the potential risks of financial crises and systemic risks.

;

;The second is to help ensure fair, transparent and orderly operation of the market. This will increase investor confidence, attract more capital to flow into the market, and promote market prosperity;

;

;Third, financial innovation will be promoted within the regulatory framework to ensure the adaptability of innovation and regulation. This will help the financial system better meet the evolving economic and social needs, thereby promoting the optimization and upgrading of China's financial sector;

;

;Fourthly, the bill will strengthen China's cooperation with international financial regulatory agencies and other Cooperation with national regulatory authorities. This will help China better integrate into the international financial system and work with other countries to respond to global financial challenges;

;

;Fifth, the bill also emphasizes the prevention and disposal of financial risks and establishes the principle of "rescue yourself first" The core principle of "after poverty, external bailout". This will help to respond to financial risks in advance and reduce the vulnerability of the financial system.

;

;Overall, the introduction of this bill reflects the Chinese government’s active role in the financial field and will make positive contributions to the healthy and sustainable development of China’s future economy and the stability and security of the international financial system. contribute. This marks that China has made great progress in financial supervision and reform, and has broad significance for the global financial market and economic system.

; Fri, 10 Nov 2023 11:25:03 +0800 赵郁飞丨移家作个画中人：我印象深刻的六部电影http://www.infzm.com/contents/260202

;

;The history of movie watching for young people in the county is evident: the sense of ritual is taught in the Army Auditorium and the Workers’ Cultural Palace, and the enjoyment is in the Main Theater The translation accent is established. The sudden release of "Titanic" stirred the air in every street and alley, and the owner of the disc rental house held the key to the world of Narnia. At that time, the "eMule" was not yet a means of transportation. It needed to be paired with the shooter's plug-in subtitles to travel. Cinema chains and video websites have arrived, occupying both the government and the opposition, and the old territory has been determined. The weird thing about time is that you don’t know what it will take away and what it will leave behind. Fortunately, the movie sets up an eternal Neverland, allowing you to easily escape into two or three hours of reality. Kuang Huifeng's "Double Tune Looking at the South of the Yangtze River" says: "Seeing that the flowers in the painting never fall, I moved home and became the person in the painting." How similar is the situation. Due to a little salvage in the river of memory, the most impressive movies are listed as follows:

;

;;

;

;;"Old Things in the South of the City";

;

;That generation of female writers who crossed the sea seemed to have a unique temperament, the tide and the gravel After polishing, the text will exude a light luster like a mother-of-pearl. Such as Lin Wenyue, who Yu Guangzhong calls "sensitive and gentle", and another example is Lin Haiyin. Fortunately, I became familiar with "Old Stories in the South" at the right time window (before puberty) and got the chance to watch the movie of the same name. "I have never seen the sea, I can't tell the difference between the sea and the sky, and I can't tell the good guys from the bad guys." When did that pure world shatter before our eyes? When her father's tombstone gradually disappeared in the autumn mountains, and finally became smaller than a red leaf, Eiko on the carriage drove away from her childhood. After my grandmother passed away this summer, I suddenly remembered this long scene. Although I have lived as a sojourner for many years and have already reached a de facto relationship with my hometown, I know that a small piece of my past related to my life has been lost forever.

;

;In my opinion, "Old Things in the South of the City" is the Chinese version of "Education of Love". The flowing and subtle emotions in it rely on the movie to materialize them one by one. If combined with the watercolor illustrations painted by Guan Weixing for this book, we can almost achieve an all-round intertextuality that "contains names and images, and encompasses audio and visual content."

;

;;

;

;; "Tiexi District Yanfen Street";

;

;"Mu Gang", "Singles" and "Dance Master" are about the Northeast of the Era. Director Yu Guangyi is exactly what I have seen since childhood. , typical Tunguska physiognomy. "Tiexi District" is different. It's so close that it's almost a complete piece of my world of experience. The mixed smell of fresh snow, sewage and burning firewood opened the random door of memory. I could walk freely through Yanfen Street without wearing VR glasses. When the curtain of mountains and dense forests is removed, even cruelty cannot be transformed into tragedy. There is no magic, only reality. The child chewed dirty words, the boy's courtship process was like a threat, and the topic on Yanfen Street gradually focused on relocation. "Sooner or later, we have to leave. No one can stop the weather." The middle-aged man sitting on the beam said it so lightly, as if what he was smashing was not his own house. I can't tell you exactly how I acquired this bitter optimism, even though I, like him, have long been accustomed to facing the fate of snow-capped mountains.

;

;;

;

;< strong>;"Eavesdropping Storm";

;

;Liu Zongyuan has an interesting "Essay on Corpse Insects", which describes a kind of corpse insect that lives in the human belly. It specializes in listening to people's words, recording them secretly, and reporting them to the Emperor of Heaven on every Gengshen Day: "Because of this, many people have been banished, suffered from illness, and died young." Mrs. Liu then cursed bitterly: "Come on, corpse insect! Don't you recognize your own shape? It's dark and treacherous, and it contains people, and it's like a thief. The old man is in this place, and he doesn't choose to be filthy and humble. He quietly listens in silence. , leading people to wrongdoing. Holding the slips secretly shakes the opportunity for disaster; the humble fists are shrinking, and the house is dangerous. Use bends as form, evil as quality. Use benevolence as evil, use blasphemy as good... , He keeps his ingenuity, is jealous of others' abilities, and is lucky to lose others." His awns are sharp and sharp, especially in "The Legend of the Grasshopper". In fact, locusts are greedy and short-sighted, but they do not necessarily harm people; the plague of corpse insects is even more unknown to Yiyu Hudi.

;

;Of course, I am talking about "The Overheard Storm". After watching the film, my friend and I fell into a long silence. Its goodness is self-evident, and its goodness also makes us sad. The story has a heart-warming ending, but the reality is that insects are "less stupid than stupid, but they still harm benevolent people." It is said that the clean version deleted the scene where Wiesler was awakened to some kind of life force after the wiretapping. Why bother.

;

;;

;

;< strong>;";;Brothers in their early days";

;

;Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, and Alan Arkin, each of them has been together for decades His experiences, sorrows and joys are combined into an atypical gangster film. The two old friends were released from prison and nursing home respectively into the market. Doc quickly tied up the thread, and what followed was a bucket list-style unfolding. Val invites a strange girl to join him on the dance floor at a bar - an apparently staged dance. Under the dim light, the faces of Val and Colonel Sfarlan kept overlapping each other, and even the two dance partners standing at opposite ends of time were somewhat similar. Hirsch relied on two mouthfuls of oxygen to condense all the essence of life, and with all his strength, his energy penetrated the rainbow. Every time he recalled that he was kissed wildly by beauties in turn, he couldn't help laughing out loud.

;

;The last shot of the film shows Val and Doc, each wearing a suit and sunglasses, holding two guns, calmly walking towards the enemy's armed forces in a building. The final battle is extremely gorgeous and decisive. Johnny Cash's chant sounded at the right time: I hurt myself today, to see if I still feel.I focus on the pain, the only thing that's  real . Remembering the rivers and lakes forever and returning to gray hair is indeed a different state, but there are many emotions in life that cannot be let go, and good nights that you are unwilling to walk into. The acting skills of the three actors are flawless, and the viewing experience is like a piece of butter toffee slowly melting in your mouth, which is really enjoyable.

;

;;

;

;; "Arrival";

;

;"Arrival" is lighter than "Interstellar" - this is of course compared to the latter's hard science fiction nature. Linguistics as a methodology is like a dagger, prying open the nut shell of the universe. In her study of alien languages, Louise Bank realized the non-linear thinking that is very different from human beings: the movement of everything is not a sequence of dominoes toppling over, but a cycle with no end and no beginning. On a huge dome called destiny, the past, present and future are spread out in her eyes at the same time (the original work by Ted Chiang is called "The Story of Your Life"). This is a sadder superpower than eternal life. She transcended time, but she still couldn't escape the cause and effect. Louise chose to get married and give birth to a daughter - even though her death was predicted years later. She named her daughter Hannah, a palindrome that means "wandering around without interruption".

;

;A few days ago, I taught students about late Qing poetry. Xie Meiru said in "The Poems of Gambling Villa": "The style of poetry... although it is extremely clever, it is ultimately beautiful." Wei Shanboxiang said: Poetry It has a palindrome, just like plum blossoms have wax plum blossoms, but the type does not meet the character." I deeply understand this statement. However, the wonderful use of "Arrival" probably depends on the aesthetic surprise brought by crossing the boundary and the right amount of ingenuity.

;

;;

;

;< strong>;"Three Billboards";

;

;My preference for crime themes can be traced back to the 1990s. When I was a child, I watched too many rough and fierce domestic criminal investigation dramas. "Three Billboards" just filled the void I felt after three seasons of "Fargo," and I realized that it was more than just a meal replacement. Two fires and three letters, the former cuts the story into natural segments, the latter is responsible for changing the trajectory of the characters, and the author of the letter, Sheriff Willoughby, is the white ball that sacrifices his life to hit others. If you want to select "classic letters in movies", this film can be selected together with "Cape 7", "Green Book", etc.

;

;Human nature is so profound and strange that creators are scrambling to take a cup of it. However, it is too difficult for man to defeat God by his cleverness. It's a common problem for screenwriters or directors to have too much ego. "Two smart heads fighting" movies are the type I dislike the most. From this perspective, the original script of "Three Billboards" can be called a paradigm, or it may directly quote Willoughby's last words to Mildred: "Like a chess move." When this narration sounded, the backlight close-up focused on Mildred's skinny appearance. Veins on the back of the hand. Actresses like Frances McDormand are truly "indispensable".

;October 18, 2023, the main venue of the 81st World Science Fiction Convention-Chengdu Science Fiction Museum, people walk in the "time and space tunnel" ;(Xinhua News Agency/Photo);

;

;A problem that has never occurred in 5 million years; h4>;

;It is not easy for Mr. Bryant, an 80-year-old science fiction fan, to travel to Chengdu from Hampshire. He first took a flight from the UK to the Netherlands, transferred in Beijing, and finally arrived in Chengdu. Pidu District, Chengdu City is the venue for the 81st World Science Fiction Convention. The local area is famous for Pixian Doubanjiang. Two years ago, Mr. Bryant voted for Chengdu, China, at the World Science Fiction Convention. In mid-October 2023, he arrived at the appointment and came to mainland China for the first time.

;

;Although Mr. Bryant has not read the most popular science fiction work in China - Liu Cixin's "Three-Body" series, nor has he read any Chinese science fiction works, after a few days with Chinese science fiction Face-to-face communication with fans, his interest in this place has gone beyond science fiction. As a lover of cooking, he plans to bring several jars of bean paste and a local cookbook in English when he returns home to study Sichuan cuisine.

;

;In the Chengdu Science Museum, which looks like a giant spacecraft and covers an area of ​​nearly 60,000 square meters, people often excitedly share their encounters with him in the WeChat group of science fiction fans on site. At the age of 80, he still has a strong curiosity about the world, which gives young science fiction fans a lot of encouragement. However, the language barrier has become Mr. Bryant's biggest challenge in participating in this conference. He has participated in 14 World Science Fiction Conventions before, and only 4 of the previous 80 conferences were held in non-English speaking countries. The venue in Chengdu had elements from science fiction movies and TV shows like "Star Trek" and "Doctor Who" that he was familiar with, but the most popular ones were Panda and "The Three-Body Problem." People often take photos with the "Three-body" stone pillars outside the venue. One of them is engraved with the warning issued by the Three-body monitor about the risk of the destruction of human civilization, "Don't answer, don't answer, don't answer!"

;

;;

;

;In November 2014, Liu Cixin and Liu Yukun (middle left) were in the same frame at the 5th Chinese Science Fiction Nebula Award Ceremony held in Beijing. ;(Photo courtesy of Li Yibo);

;

;When he arrived in Chengdu, Ethan, a software engineer from New York, USA, was about to finish reading "The Three-Body Problem" The first one, for which he temporarily put aside a collection of short African science fiction novels he was reading. At nearly 40 years old, the only Chinese science fiction work he had read before was "The Story of Your Life" by Ted Chiang (the original work of the movie "Arrival"). This time, the Chengdu Organizing Committee provided benefits such as travel assistants, transportation, Hugo Awards, and opening ceremony viewing quotas for science fiction fans who came from 3,000 kilometers away. However, Ethan believes that many European and American science fiction fans have given up on attending the conference remotely. Obviously, "there are language barriers, there are few direct flights, air tickets are expensive, and you need to transfer in other countries." He said that science fiction fans in Europe and the United States are mainly middle-aged and elderly, and traveling for more than ten hours will be very hard.

;

;In December 2021, the 79th World Science Fiction Convention was held in Washington, USA. The Ethan family witnessed the success of Chengdu Science Fiction. This process was full of twists and turns. “At that time, there were many discussions about whether the conference should be held in China, such as whether it could comply with conference traditions, voting formats, cultural differences, etc. Of course, the current political situation is also very complicated,” he said. In the travel warning to China issued by the U.S. State Department at the end of June 2023, mainland China was listed as a "third-level" travel destination, calling on U.S. citizens to "reconsider whether to go." After hesitating for a month or two, Ethan finally decided to come to mainland China to take a look. When he said this, we were sitting around a table eating butter hotpot. Several other sci-fi fans attending the meeting were from Russia, Canada and Indonesia.

;

;;

;

;On July 26, 1999, Liu Cixin attended the "Science Fiction World" PEN Conference in Chengdu. At this time, he was participating in a PEN discussion with his new work "The Wandering Earth".

;

;The organizing committee has previously announced a set of data as of August 31: In addition to members of the World Science Fiction Association who enjoy offline participation rights, non-Chinese participants who purchased offline participation packages There were 51 people, accounting for 1% of the total number of people who purchased offline package tickets. There were 3,908 Chinese citizens who purchased offline package tickets, most of whom were attending the conference for the first time - including Xiami. Xiami, who is in his early 30s, is a physics teacher at a university in Xiamen, Fujian. In 2003, Xiami, who was in the second grade of junior high school, read novels by Wang Jinkang, Liu Cixin and others in a borrowed magazine "Science Fiction World", and "officially entered the pit of science fiction."

;

;However, let Xiami prepare What makes him feel disappointed is that although the venue is large, the area and number of science fiction fan exhibition areas are far less than he expected. Afterwards, Xiami was very sorry to hear that Ethan brought the board game with him but could not find a suitable venue or playmate. After college, he mainly devoted his energy to theoretical research. "This conference is like going back to the pit to take a look." There is a long "tail" on Xiami's participation card - if you participate in the booth activities, you will have the opportunity to obtain a booth. Homemade creative ribbons, which are traditional peripherals at science fiction conventions. During the second half of the conference, Xiami turned to the salon of new generation writers. His notebook was filled with notes about the creation of science fiction novels, and his suitcase also contained more than a dozen novels by new generation writers. He is ready to restart the dream he had in high school - to write science fiction.

;

;However, with the rapid changes in reality, can science fiction still provide people with enough strangeness and surprise, and can science fiction creation keep up with the magic of reality?

;

;"Now, reality and science fiction do have a competitive relationship." Science fiction writer Han Song said. Sometimes he serves as a judge for science fiction awards and finds that some science fiction works are not as surprising and strange as reality. "Reality is more like an alien world."

;

;The 58-year-old Han Song is the leader of the external editorial department of Xinhua News Agency , is also a science fiction writer. Before arriving at the venue, he had already published a rather optimistic report on Xinhua News Agency, "Embracing Science Fiction, Creating Tomorrow." For more than thirty years, he spent the day writing, editing and distributing news reports for the world at the Xinhua News Agency building on Xuanwumen West Street in Beijing. He got up at three or four in the morning to write science fiction before going to work. In 2018, he finished writing the science fiction novel "Hospital" trilogy. A few years later, when the COVID-19 pandemic hit the world, many people turned to his novels to contrast the visions of reality. Han Song continued to compile and publish reports on the COVID-19 epidemic.

;

;In 1939, the first World Science Fiction Convention was held in New York, USA, reflecting that in the 20th century when the theory of relativity and quantum mechanics appeared, the evolution of human civilization entered a new stage, "another turning point has been reached." Han Song He said, "Quantum mechanics and the theory of relativity have appeared in the past 100 years. All the material foundations we have today are laid by these two theories. In these 100 years, humans have created weapons that can destroy themselves and other life on the earth. This is 500 years of human evolution." A phenomenon that has never happened in ten thousand years. Now we have nuclear weapons, artificial intelligence, nanotechnology, and life technology." One of the meanings of the existence of science fiction is to face these problems.

;

;Many salons at this science fiction conference talked about artificial intelligence, controllable nuclear fusion, quantum computing and communications. More than 80 years after the birth of nuclear weapons, some countries have used controllable nuclear fusion technology to solve the earth's energy problems. During the conference, science fiction writers were invited to the Southwest Institute of Physics of the CNNC Nuclear Industry to visit the nuclear fusion device known as the "artificial sun" - China Gyre 3, a new generation of artificial sun - which was selected for the "Annual Science Fiction Plan". 74-year-old science fiction writer Wang Jinkang stood in front of the "artificial sun" and observed. As a senior engineer specializing in internal combustion engines, he once used nuclear energy to build a new path from the earth to outer space in science fiction novels.

;

;Han Song, who also came to visit, immediately conducted an interview and wrote a report "Science Fiction Writer Approaches "Artificial Sun"". The two-story ring-shaped device is covered with colorful pipelines and surrounded by instruments and computers. The nuclear fusion device looks like a giant monster. Most of the scientists explaining it on site are women. Han Song immediately thought of "Frankenstein" written by the British writer Mary Shelley in 1818, which was the first modern science fiction novel in human history. "Science fiction was created by women." He was also thinking about his own science fiction. If controllable nuclear fusion solves the energy crisis of the entire earth, and if everyone on the earth has equal access to so much energy, will families and marriages disappear?

;

;In Han Song’s view, science fiction is a species literature. “有时候文学是一个民族的心灵史，但科幻是把人类物种作为一个对象来描写的文学。”他觉得这就是每一次科幻大会的意义，“所以你总是会好奇，想了解跟我们一样的这些人，面对同一种技术、同样一个命题，他们是怎么想的？”

;世界的科幻文学

;

;1990年，为了节省开支，杨潇女士乘坐8天8夜的火车，横跨欧亚大陆，去荷兰海牙参加国际科幻专业协会（WSF）年会，同行的还有时任四川省外事办公室新闻出版处处长申再望、《科幻世界》美术编辑向际纯。他们拖着一大箱四川科幻文学的成果和熊猫元素的礼物，再次争取1991年WSF年会的成都举办权。

;

;前一年5月，作为《科学文艺》主编的杨潇只身奔赴在圣马力诺举办的WSF年会，二三十人坐在一间小会议室里，讨论全球科幻最关注的问题，“在讲大气污染、人类在太空中的位置、低温生命维持、飞向太空……”

;

;“中国科幻正在起步，中国的青少年很喜欢科幻。”她在会上反复说。她的英语不太好，答辩时全程拿着两小本《汉英简明辞典》《英汉简明辞典》，记在纸上英译中、再中译英，但最终为成都拿下了1991年的WSF年会举办权。在场的其他人说她“With a little English and lots of determination to do a lot of things（用一点英语和很多决心去做很多事）”。

;

;然而这一决定在之后被推翻，要在1990年的WSF年会重新投票选定1991年的会议举办国。这次杨潇一行三人准备充分，回答各种问题和质疑，展示中国科幻的成果和熊猫的可爱模样。会议讨论尾声，英国科幻新浪潮运动主将、WSF发起人之一的布莱恩·奥尔迪斯站了起来，他的话向来一言九鼎，一向温和的他严肃、郑重地说：“政治争执只是一时的，东西方之间的对话和了解是长期的，人们之间的友好是永恒的。我们不要跟着政治风云走。”

;

;在1980年代，奥尔迪斯与中国科幻作家郑文光就有通信。郑文光生于1929年，曾是中国科学院北京天文台研究员。 1957年，郑文光的小说《火星建设者》在莫斯科世界青年联欢节获奖，这是第一篇在国外获奖的中国科幻作品。有一次，收到郑文光寄来的信和新书《郑文光新作选》，奥尔迪斯在回信中对书名表达了惊讶，难道你们那真的叫这种名字吗？这种名字在我们这是卖不出去的，我们这出合集，得摘里头最好看的小说来当书名。

;

;1991年5月，中国成都，国际科幻专业协会年会的现场，66岁的奥尔迪斯与62岁的郑文光重逢，那时的郑文光已经坐上了轮椅，奥尔迪斯在各个场合都帮忙推着他的轮椅。那年到场的还有美国科幻作家弗雷德里克·波尔等。这场年会还请了在高校开设科幻创作课的学者吴岩等人，对年轻的创作者也充满鼓励——为了让武汉大学学生韩松加入，《科幻世界》的总编谭楷写信给不相识的武汉大学校长、数学家齐民友，齐很快批准并资助了400元作为食宿费用。会上，韩松把早前被退稿的《宇宙墓碑》给在场的台湾学者吕应钟看，吕应钟带到台湾交给了作家张系国、张大春，最后这篇小说在1991年获得世界华人科幻文艺奖。

;

;;

;

;2023年10月18日，在2023成都世界科幻大会主题展览上，参观者在欣赏机器人“寂静”打架子鼓;（新华社/图）;

;

;在这场连接了许多人的科幻年会后，中国科幻重新走上了轨道。创刊于1979年的《科学文艺》在同年更名为《科幻世界》，后来接连发表新作者王晋康、韩松、何夕、刘慈欣的科幻小说——如今他们成为了中国科幻界的“四大天王”。年会上集体参观都江堰时，23岁的韩松问一位外国老头，在世界科幻中，关于政治的主题怎么写？他后来才知道这人就是奥尔迪斯。

;

;“他来过这里两次，总是非常热情地谈论他所认识的人以及科幻界正在发生的事，并非常希望中国的科幻作品能得到更多认可，这也是他如此热衷于举办那次科幻年会的原因。他的书房里总是有一张他和杨潇的照片，这对他来说非常重要。”在2023年成都世界科幻大会，奥尔迪斯的女儿温迪·奥尔迪斯对我说，这天下午她完成了两场与杨潇对话的沙龙。如今，奥尔迪斯先生已经去世六年。

;

;1991年到成都时，奥尔迪斯曾为到成都前转机被弄丢一件行李而懊恼不已，那是一小箱送给《科幻世界》编辑部的科幻书籍。温迪这次带了一大摞父亲的书，活动时就放在沙龙的桌子上。

;

;奥尔迪斯书里的一些事已经变成现实。奥尔迪斯最著名的作品是从1961年开始在英国《幻想与科幻》上连载的《丛林温室》，他构建了一个智能植物称霸地球的“后地球时代”，那时的地球已是一个停止了自转的巨大温室，与月球形成了一个稳定的系统，通天的植物将枝叶蔓伸到了有飞人居住的月球。史蒂文·斯皮尔伯格导演的电影《人工智能》则改编自奥尔迪斯的《玩转整个夏天的超级玩具》。小说诗意而忧伤，这是关于拥有人类情感的机器人的故事，机器人不想让养育他的人类发现，他已经知道了自己是机器人。

;

;奥尔迪斯的作品充满对现代文明的反思。实际上，诞生于1818年的英国科幻文学，本就是科技革命和工业革命的产物。这种相比其他文学类型很晚才出现的文类，最初有着两种创造现代社会的愿景：一是乌托邦，起源于大航海时代的亦真亦假的游记；二是人类会持续进步的思想，这是随着启蒙运动和法国大革命而逐渐成型的叙事，并在世界范围内对人类的思想产生深远影响。

;

;中国的科幻文学就伴随着启蒙现代性而生。 20世纪初，鲁迅翻译了《月界旅行》《地底旅行》《造人术》等科幻小说（当时叫“科学小说”）。同时期，越来越多名家加入到科幻文学的译介或创作中。那时科幻文学的参与者大多向往科技进步带来的时代变化，并探讨人类及世界未来的种种可能。新中国成立后，郑文光等新中国第一批科幻作家出现，他们的科幻小说承担了一部分科普责任，中国科幻上世纪初对现代性的积极态度得到了一定程度的延续。

;

;;

;

;2023年10月17日，成都科幻大会主场馆旁的无人机表演;（视觉中国/图）;

;

;而在现代化进程更早的西方，始终不乏对现代文明有所警惕的科幻作品，甚至在第一篇现代科幻小说《弗兰肯斯坦》中，就已经有对科学的怀疑。

;

;当人类可以研制出毁灭地球的武器、发动灭绝物种的战争时，西方国家以外也出现了成熟的反思现代性的作品。

;

;1964年，日本举办奥运会那年，日本科幻作家小松左京开始写《日本沉没》，这部写了九年的小说在出版后轰动了日本社会，小说描写日本列岛因地壳大变动而沉入海底。日本战后的经济奇迹反而让小松左京深感忧虑，他为人们消耗大量资源和能源、与自然界和社会形成紧张冲突的关系而担忧，也流露出对人类命运的巨大悲悯和同情。 “日本科幻对我的影响很大，具体到《三体》，其实受了《日本沉没》巨大的影响。我看《日本沉没》后很震惊。一部科幻作品竟然能把一个民族深处最敏感、脆弱的对未来的恐惧感体现出来。”刘慈欣曾说。

;

;和小松左京一样活跃于20世纪下半叶的日本科幻作家星新一，其短篇小说《喂！出来》曾在21世纪初被收入中国语文课本。很多国内的中学生第一次在教科书读到这一类型的故事。小说里，地球上突然出现一个无底洞，人类发现这个洞无穷无尽，便毫无顾忌地将自己制造的所有垃圾和污染物倒了进去。后来，当人类无休止倾倒的破坏和欲望全部被喷回地面返还给人类时，作为预兆的恰是人类发现这个洞时那句天真无知的呐喊，“喂——出来！”

;

;2007年，世界科幻大会第一次走进亚洲。日本横滨，第65届世界科幻大会开幕式上，76岁的小松左京坐在轮椅上出场，他是把日本乃至亚洲科幻推向世界的第一人。 “半个多世纪前，他就如先知一般，预言科学进步并不必定使人幸福，他表达了人类的痛苦，揭示了人性的野蛮，同时寄予期望和光明。”韩松非常喜欢小松左京，那年他和作家、学者吴岩，《科幻世界》社长秦莉、总编姚海军一起到横滨参加科幻大会。小松左京看到他们非常开心，握着韩松的手，用中文反复说，多谢，多谢。

;

;“时代已经追上来了”

;

;2023年，世界科幻大会第二次来到亚洲。在成都世界科幻大会现场，只要有刘慈欣出席的场合，他总像磁石般吸引着全场的欢呼和注目。即便不是当场嘉宾，他的名字和《三体》也是沙龙里各国嘉宾绕不开的话题。作为中国最著名的科幻作家，刘慈欣的签售会被组委会特意安排了三个小时，从下午两点半开始，然而当天上午11点刚过，签售大厅便已排起了长队。以往刘慈欣每次签售都坚持签完最后一位排队的读者，这次他签了三个小时，签到手抖，还想坚持，但被主办方拦住了。

;

;

;2023年10月21日，四川成都，中国作家海漄（中） 创作的《时空画师》 获雨果奖最佳短中篇小说奖;（新华社/图）;

;

;2015年，《三体》获得了第73届雨果奖最佳长篇小说奖，刘慈欣成为首个获此殊荣的亚洲作家。如今，60岁的刘慈欣已经成为中国最著名的作家之一。

;

;这次的科幻大会会场，中庭最显眼的位置有一座约9米高的白色雕塑，原型是《流浪地球2》中的月面机器人机械狗“笨笨”，总是有很多人围着笨笨拍照，它是“流浪地球”IP授权业务中最具代表性的产品形象。改编自刘慈欣同名小说的《流浪地球2》在中国大陆票房累计40.29亿元，全球票房5.98亿美元，还将代表中国大陆角逐第96届奥斯卡奖最佳国际影片。

;

;成为著名作家之前，刘慈欣的工作是工程师，在山西省阳泉市一个名叫“娘子关”的小镇的电厂工作。在他成名后，那个小镇被很多新闻记者探访。本届科幻大会的一系列活动中，刘慈欣在一场主题为“工程师科幻”的沙龙中展现出难得的放松和尽兴，“现实中再困难的事情，在小说中都能解决，不费吹灰之力。难就难在曲折的技术建构，如何把最疯狂的想象、最缥缈的超级技术用最有实感的细节写出来，让读者就像在看新闻报道和历史记录那般真实。”他钟爱工程师科幻的独特美学，渴望自己能做到，也渴望在别人的作品中读到。

;

;“随着各大陆资源的枯竭和环境的恶化，世界把目光投向南极洲……但人类的理智在另一方面取得了胜利，全球彻底销毁核武器的最后进程开始了，随着全球无核化的实现，人类对南极大陆的争夺变得安全了一些。”刘慈欣于2003年发表在《科幻世界》的短篇小说《地球大炮》是虾米的入坑之作。小说贯穿着一种镇定和坚毅：政府建造了一条从漠河穿过地心直达南极的隧道。这项超级工程因灾难性事故而被封闭。此后全球环境进一步恶化，人类为寻找出路，决意把地球上的工业转移到太空。隧道被重新启用，人类在其中加上磁铁线圈，利用地心引力和安培力把地球变成了“地球大炮”，得以低成本地把地表物品抛送到近地轨道。

;

;第一次读到这个构想恢弘的故事时，还在读初二的虾米便感受到了与其他文学作品迥异的刺激和惊喜，“我一下就被那种新奇的设定和宏大的史诗感击中。”从此《科幻世界》成了虾米的每月必读刊物。到了2006年，虾米在《科幻世界》读到刚开始连载的《三体》，当科幻迷们津津乐道地分析《三体》中的物理设定时，没有人能预见这部小说将把中国科幻引向什么样的未来。

;

;;

;

;成都世界科幻大会的一场沙龙间隙，布莱恩特先生向本刊记者展示他自制的塑封卡片，里面是他参加的过往14届世界科幻大会证件的集锦。 80岁的他表示自己回家后，会将本次的参会感想和建议通过邮件分享给主办方。 “十年后如果中国再次举办世界科幻大会，我希望自己还能来参加”;（南方人物周刊记者陈洋/图）;

;

;刘慈欣写《三体》第三部期间，曾在杭州参加了一次科幻作家笔会。大家聊“如果要把杭州彻底毁灭，应该用什么方法”，他一激动，说可以先把城市二维化，变成一幅水墨山水，再一维化，成为一根细细的丝线。大家听了都很兴奋。酒醒之后，刘慈欣很紧张。还好没有人挪用这个科幻构想。二向箔正是于2010年出版的《三体III:死神永生》中最令人惊艳的宇宙规律武器之一。它的能力是降维攻击，将三维坍缩成二维。

;

;《三体III》出版的2010年，随着智能手机和4G网络的普及，中国从PC互联网时代跨入移动互联网时代。小米和美团在这一年成立，微信在次年推出。小米创始人雷军在2010年看完《三体》后又推荐给其他企业家，并多次公开谈及《三体》的“降维攻击”“黑暗森林”对互联网战略的启发。 《三体》系列收获了科幻圈的推崇，而这些互联网新贵们的讨论则令这部作品打破圈层，真正进入大众视野。

;

;科幻在一个地区的发展需要现实土壤，这在其他国家早已得到验证。 19世纪，英法科幻文学受益于工业革命而发展，以凡尔纳、威尔斯为代表。二战后，以美国为代表的西方科幻文学进入鼎盛期。而日本科幻的高速发展时期是1970-80 年代，1970 年代的日本缔造了经济快速发展的“日本奇迹”。

;

;经过美籍华裔作家刘宇昆翻译，英文版《三体》在2014年开始传播。 Facebook创始人扎克伯格称《三体》“把我从最近所读过的经济、社会、科学书籍中解脱出来，令我感到轻松愉悦”。时任美国总统奥巴马看完《三体》后，“觉得当个美国总统和浩瀚的宇宙相比实在太渺小了。毕竟每天处理的都是和国会争论的琐事，不用担心外星人入侵。”

;

;2022年，《三体》英文版权续约金高达125万美元，创下中国文学作品海外版权输出的最高纪录。美国流媒体订阅平台奈飞制作的《三体》剧集将于2024年登上荧幕。 “中国科幻就是国际传播非常成功的例子，不是说花了多少钱，不是一定要生硬地往世界推广。我觉得中国科幻是向世界学习，把世界科幻好的东西跟中国的传统文化和现代文化融合，打上了很强的中国烙印，再让世界去感受中国人的科幻。中国科幻面对世界的普遍性问题，比如环境、太空、战争等等问题，提出了中国式的解答，让世界感受到这个解答是有价值的、独一无二的，能够给世界带来意想不到的收获和惊喜。”韩松说。

;
